Features:
o Free Music & Videos Streaming

o 14+ Live Radio stations
o Mood based Discovery for songs
o Unlimited Downloading. Download as many Songs and Videos for offline play, try it now.
o We have enabled HD Audio streaming for PRO users
o Favorite & share what you like with friends and/ or save them to your playlist.

Need assistance? Try one of the below!

It could be a memory issue. Double click the home button to see a dock of all apps that are running in the background. If there are a lot running, you may want to close some apps completely (click and hold the icon in the dock till the X sign appears, tap to close it) since some programs drain phone memory. Then restart the Hungama App. If you are still facing issues, do report the problem and we\'ll help you out.
Hungama App is the one-stop destination to stream
